madewhere

  • Vendors

Vendors

Vendors are listed for brands which do not sell direct to consumer, or that import goods to countries where they are not directly sold.

In some cases, vendors with an ethos similar to ours may be listed, even if they are a second source for brands that can be bought directly.

Vendors

Heath Ceramics

Heath Ceramics is primarily known for their ceramic products, but they also act as a vendor for a wide variety of items which appear to be from reasonable sources. They list origin of products they carry prominently on individual product pages.
Vendors

Blue Owl

Blue Owl is a retailer which specializes in workwear, carrying a number of well made brands including a large number Japanese brands. Unfortunately not all of the brands they carry are responsibly made, so research each before buying. They also have a physical store in Seattle, WA.
Vendors

WebstaurantStore

WebstaurantStore is a large online retailer specializing in the food service industry, but they will sell to the general public. They are USA focused, and will prominently display badges on USA-made goods, as well as allowing that as a search constraint.
